name: Pig In Tower
description:
BACK THIS PROJECT ON KICKSTARTER! All the money is for IOS, the apple store is $99 dolars a year, so with this everyone can play it for free. I alrready have the authorization for playstore in android so everyone can see it run in devices.   I´ll still make videogames for devices after this proyect, arcade old style games. This kickstarter are for all my next arcade games for devices, and i hope you can follow my projects :3 PIG IN TOWER

Pig in tower is a FREE MOBILE videogame you can play with one hand in devices!

The game is about a flying pig that it has to get to the top of the tower to be a free pig . The game has always the same path, but it gets more difficult and faster the deeper you go.You have to memorize the path and think faster the deeper you go. The game it will be 10 minutes long with no pauses. So, can you take the challenge?

PC VERSION The FINAL GAME for PC will be cost 1 dollar but its going to have       * 2 exclusive skins      * No ads      * Keyboard controls ANDROID DEMO LINK

 http://bit.ly/2OdoNy5
